name: Ravenous Void
description:
Brave the unknown to gather the power to fend off the darkness.

Use WASD to move around the world.

All code and assets were created in 48 hours for Ludum Dare 45. The game was created with Unity 2018. Most of the models were created with unity's bas shapes. The map is continuously generated before its edges are approached. The background music is generated in code from a JSON music description file.

https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/45/ravenous-void
